name: Created with Code
body:
### "Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere"
In school my favorite class was art because I loved the creativity of art projects. My second favorite was math because I loved the logic and reasoning. **Created with Code, LLC** is the best combination of those two things. My goal is to support new developers and potential developers to see that programming is a very creative field, and it can be really fun when you learn how to communicate your logic in a way the computer understands. 

In my experience, learning how to program is the most fun when you are writing games. The best part is when you can have a friend or family member play your creation. I want to help bring that experience to people.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
